content.title: Kadthal farmers meet PGCIL officials over losing lands due to Bidar-Maheshwaram line
content.body: Just in: Led by BRS MP V. Ravichandra, ex-MLA G. Jaipal Yadav, they urge Powergrid officials to save their valuable lands with 765 kV transmission line
